name: UAssetReferencingPolicySettings
doc: Settings for the Asset Referencing Policy, these settings are used to determine which plugins and game folders can reference content from each other

DefaultProjectContentRule: The default rules for project content (if a more specific rule doesn't apply)
AdditionalDomains: List of additional domains to carve out from the project content folder
bIgnoreEditorOnlyReferences: If true, ignore any editor-only domain references that will not affect the cooked game
